item.title: Problem with a script
item.dc:creator: @jr_pwn jr pwn
item.description:
@jr_pwn wrote:

i figured it out me and whoever is helping me are java noobs!

case 10692: if(HasItemAmount(2411, 1) { addItem(2433, 1); deleteItem(2411, GetItemSlot(2411), 1); } else { sendMessage("Gimme that key first please!"); } break;

this is how it should look

case 10692: if(HasItemAmount(2411, 1)) // we forgot that parenthesis { addItem(2433, 1); deleteItem(2411, GetItemSlot(2411), 1); } else { sendMessage("Gimme that key first please!"); } break;

hahah forgot the extra parenthesis

item.title: Problem with a script
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

case 10692: if(HasItemAmount(2411, 1) { addItem(2433, 1); deleteItem(2411, GetItemSlot(2411), 1); } else { sendMessage("Gimme that key first please!"); } break;

That’s pretty much the same code…you should be able to get what you want. Or try this…

case 10692: if(HasItemAmount(2411, 1) { addItem(2433, 1); deleteItem(2411, GetItemSlot(2411), 1); } else { sendMessage("Gimme that key first please!"); } break;

item.title: Problem with a script
item.dc:creator: @jr_pwn jr pwn
item.description:
@jr_pwn wrote:

ok this is what i have so far.

case 10692: // body if(HasItemAmount(2411, 1) ||playerRights >=0 { addItem(2433, 1); deleteItem(2411, GetItemSlot(2411), 1); } else { sendMessage("gemme that key first please!"); } break;

it seems everytime i click on the case object 10692 it will give me the item 2433 even if i dont have the item 2411 and it will never send me the message “gemme that key first please!” what am i doing wrong?
